headline: Elon Musk 'Jokingly' Refers To Apple As The 'Tesla Graveyard' And Says Steve Jobs Was 'Kind Of A Jerk' To Him When They Met At A Party
summary: Elon Musk doesn't hold back when it comes to Apple. From calling the company the "Tesla Graveyard" to criticizing its AI plans and reflecting on his unpleasant encounter with Steve Jobs, Musk's comments make it clear that the rivalry between these tech giants is personal, professional and competitive.
